name: Font Size
author: seosbg

sections.description:
This WordPress plugin allows you to change the size of basic HTML elements. Simply amazing and easy to use.
To learn more about the Font Size plugin please see Plugin URI. See screenshot examples at http://seosthemes.com/font-size/
sections.installation:
Install via Plugins > Install New

  1. Search for “Font Size”
  2. Click the “Install Now” link
  3. Click “Activate Plugin”

Via ZIP / FTP

  1. Unzip the ZIP file and drop the folder straight into your wp-content/plugins directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
sections.faq:
Is there a tutorial?

See the Tutorial

Where can I find documentation on the plugin?

Refer the Plugin Site
